name: Shexyo Style
description:
LORA trained on the art of Shexyo.

Made months ago, reuploading on civitai as new link.

If you weren't aware, this is also very fucking nearly the exact same style of Ouroboros/Savagexthicc, so once again, let's dispense with the bullshit that AI "copies" art while humans don't😂.

150 images, trained on NAI and tested across multiple models.

NSFW capable. Trigger token may or may not be necessary.

Images in preview may be from past versions! Do not expect full replication!

Images you make with this model and what you do with them are your responsibility!
